# Post Raid Message To Discord

Post a message to your discord server whenever you get raided.

## Setup instructions

1. Use the import string below
2. Set the required discord webhooks field - https://help.dashe.io/en/articles/2521940-how-to-create-a-discord-webhook-url
3. Adjust any OPTIONAL variables, e.g. the message to post, how you should be referred to, etc. (e.g. ADJ, I) or leave blank to use your twitch display name.
4. set your Settings > Events > Raid > Generic Action dropdown value to this action. (Or preferably, follow my [recommendations](../README.md#recommendation-for-importing-actions-in-streamerbot) here. 


## Import string
